description: This file defines a mock implementation class for persistent store interfaces used in testing or development within the app-gateway2 project. It includes mock method declarations for various store operations, such as register, unregister, get/set value, delete key/namespace, and cache management, conforming to multiple interface classes.

classes.name: PersistentStoreImplementationMock
classes.description: Mock class implementing multiple store-related interfaces for unit testing, providing mock methods for store operations, cache management, and namespace handling.

methods.name: ~PersistentStoreImplementationMock
methods.description: Default destructor for the mock class.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification callback with the store.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Sets a key-value pair within a namespace.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Retrieves a value for a given key in a namespace.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Deletes a specific key from a namespace.

methods.name: Register (IStore2)
methods.description: Register a notification callback for IStore2.

methods.name: Unregister (IStore2)
methods.description: Unregister a notification callback for IStore2.

methods.name: SetValue (IStore2)
methods.description: Sets a value with scope, namespace, key, value, and TTL.

methods.name: GetValue (IStore2)
methods.description: Gets a value with scope, namespace, key, and outputs value and ttl.

methods.name: DeleteKey (IStore2)
methods.description: Deletes a key within a specified scope.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace (IStore2)
methods.description: Deletes a namespace within a specified scope.

methods.name: GetKeys
methods.description: Retrieves keys within a scope and namespace.

methods.name: GetNamespaces
methods.description: Retrieves all namespaces within a scope.

methods.name: GetStorageSizes
methods.description: Retrieves storage size information for a scope.

methods.name: GetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Retrieves storage limit for a namespace.

methods.name: SetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Sets storage limit for a namespace.
